details.title: Set Filter Conditions
details.description: Allows to select a project, release and sprints.

outputendpoint.name: build-filter-list
outputendpoint.label: Build Filter
outputendpoint.description: Provides the condition list for filtering builds using the selected sprints and the selected user

outputendpoint.name: issue-filter
outputendpoint.label: Issue Filter
outputendpoint.description: Provides the condition list for filtering issues using the selected sprints and the selected user
